___^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+\\.[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+\\.[0.description: Lists the locations of all output tiles with a given sequence of corner terrain types.
___^[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+\\.[0-9a-zA-Z_-]+\\.[0.title: Tile group schema

items.description: Specifies the location of a Wangscape output tile.
items.title: Tile location schema

___x.description: Specifies the horizontal offset, in pixels, of the tile within the tileset.
___x.title: Tile x offset schema

___y.description: Specifies the vertical offset, in pixels, of the tile within the tileset.
___y.title: Tile y offset schema

___filename.title: Specifies the filename of the tileset containing the tile.

description: Lists Wangscape output tiles with locations, grouped by corner terrain types.
title: Wangscape tile groups schema
